name: Alliance VITA
goal: Alliance VITA is a non gouvernmental and non profit organization based in Paris and Brussels, focused on bioethics issues, human dignity and fundamental rights.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Development, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and Technology, Youth
euInitiatives: Reproductive health, family policies, violence against women, gender equality and social rights, violence against women, children rights, human trafficking, rights of disabled people, end of life issues, active ageing, intergenerational solidarity, palliative care development,  suicide prevention, medical research.
